concept.title: Java considerations
concept.shortdesc: ACME xPro requires Java 5, Java 6, or Java 7. In general, newer versions of Java have better functionality and performance.

conbody.section:
Supported versionsYou can use ACME xPro with Java 5, Java 6, and Java 7. The version that you use must be currently supported by the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) vendor. ACME xPro takes advantage of Java Version 5 , Version 6 , and Version 7 functionality as it becomes available. Generally, newer versions of the ACME xPro and Java have better performance and functionality.
For more information, see Supported softwaresee Supported softwaresee Supported software.Version 3 of ACME xPro requires Java 5.
